section.title: Petstore Dashboard
section.p: The "dashboard" is petstore's initial screen. It appears because userStart.inq, the script returned by the client login sequence, amongst other things includes this:
The dashboard GUI is implemented in gui/userMain.inq.
section.note: loadclient() resolves URLs relative to the current script.
section.p: The dashboard GUI is a simple layout of buttons. Their properties are configured, a layout performed and event handlers attached. The Table Layout is used. For further details see on using table layout see the Inq Mini Guide.
